text: Kappa Mikey is an American animated television series. It was created by Larry Schwarz. The series was created by Schwarz's studio Animation Collective. The series was first broadcast on February 25, 2006. It ended on September 20, 2008. 52 episodes were made. ==Voice cast== * Michael Sinterniklaas as Mikey Simon * Kether Donohue as Lily * Carrie Keranen as Mitsuki * Sean Schemmel as Gonard * Gary Mack as Guano * Stephen Moverly as Ozu * Jesse Adams as Yes Man / Yoshi ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Nicktoons Category:2000s American animated television series Category:English-language television programs Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:2008 American television series endings
title: Kappa Mikey
